Qeion

From Peragro Tempus Wiki

Qeion (Kay - On) trees:

A deciduous forest tree that grows mainly in the forests east of the Nerav Mountain Range. Unlike most species these trees are colonial in nature. What appears to be many trees is often actually offshoots from the roots of one large entity, and as such their underground root system is vast and deep, providing a solid base for their exceptionally large trunks. This base means they are also difficult to uproot making them very resistant to the storms that roll in from the eastern coasts. Their branches are long and thin and as a result are often curved and droop a good distance.

  • Height: 90 Meters
  • Crown Spread: 110 Meters
  • Trunk Circumference: 15 Meters


Concept:

Category: Plantlife
